subject: RE: [junit] Class coupling measure?
msgSnippet: Chuck, Thanks! Working great after I downloaded the very latest ant source and built it locally.  For whatever reason, it didn t work with the prebuilt
messageBody:
Chuck,

Thanks! Working great after I downloaded the very latest ant source and
built it locally. For whatever reason, it didn't work with the prebuilt
binaries. Exactly what I was looking for.

Thanks again,
Richard
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chuck Stern [mailto:cstern@...]
> Sent: Thursday, February 07, 2002 2:31 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [junit] Class coupling measure?
>
> Richard,
>
> Here is my ant target for jdepend:
>
> <target name="dependencies" depends="init" >
> <property name="depends.dir" value="${docs.dir}/metrics" />
> <mkdir dir="${depends.dir}" />
>
> <!-- NOTE: you need the jdepend.jar in your classpath -->
> <jdepend outputfile="${depends.dir}/jdepend.xml" fork="yes"
> format="xml">
> <sourcespath>
> <pathelement location="${src.java.dir}" />
> </sourcespath>
> </jdepend>
>
> <style basedir="${depends.dir}" destdir="${depends.dir}"
> includes="jdepend.xml"
> style="${optional.files.dir}/jdepend/jdepend.xsl"/>
>
> </target>
>
> Note the format="xml" attribute in the jdepend task. I think that is
new
> in
> Ant 1.5. Once you output to xml the style task uses the new style
sheet
> to
> make the fancy report.
>
> Chuck
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Richard Brooks [mailto:rbrooks@...]
> Sent: Thursday, February 07, 2002 2:27 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Cc: bodewig@...
> Subject: RE: [junit] Class coupling measure?
>
>
> Stefan,
>
> Thanks for the tip. I got JDepend integrated into Ant and spitting
out
> appropriate statistics to a text file but I'm durned if I can figure
out
> how to make it produce xml out of the jdepend task in Ant (therefore
> this really neat styling seems not available). Am I just behind by
using
> Ant 1.4.1 or is there something I'm missing?
>
> Thanks again,
> Richard
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Stefan Bodewig [mailto:bodewig@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, February 07, 2002 10:45 AM
> > To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> > Subject: Re: [junit] Class coupling measure?
> >
> > On Thu, 7 Feb 2002, Chuck Stern <cstern@...>
wrote:
> >
> > > especially now that there is a style sheet to transform the output
> > > into a nice html report (you'll need the nightly release of Ant to
> > > get this).
> >
> > Well, you don't need a complete nightly build, you can get the
> > stylesheet directly from viewcvs:
> >
> > <http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs/~checkout~/jakarta-
> > ant/src/etc/jdepend.xsl?content-type=text/plain>
> >
> > Stefan
> >
